content.rendered:
Yield Optimization for Ads

GreedyGame is an end-to-end implementation, mediation and optimization platform for Ads

Sign Up

Everything you need for revenue growth

1. Ad strategy

We help build the right monetization strategy for your app maintaining a great user-experience and increasing your ARPDAU

2. Ad mediation

We analyze your AdMob account and help create a mediation stack that best meets your revenue targets

✔ Partner identification

✔ Mix of waterfall + sandwich model

✔Increase in ARPDAU

3. Native optimization

With our product suite, publishers can now implement native ads with ease and automate design optimization to improve CTR and thus higher CPMs for each impression.

Learn More
0 Years

Native Ads
Experience

for Client

Saved per Month

Impressions handled per Day

Recognition

Emerge 50 2017 companies - NASSCOM

Top 50 disruptor brands - Pitch 2017, an e4M initiative

Wharton India 2017 - Finalists

16 global startup sponsored by Google

Arena Winners - TechInAsia

What People Say

Ayub, CEO @ Maleo (Publisher)

Integrating GG into our game is definitely one of the best decisions we have made in a long time. Our users are actually happy with the native ads (no kidding, they love to make a story with the ads while playing the game). Statistic wise, we don’t see even the slightest drop in the number of users and play time. And the best thing is, we’re getting around 30% bump in our overall revenue!

P.R. Rajendran, CEO @ Nextwave Multimedia (Publisher)

GreedyGame Ad SDK is a big bonus for game developers.

Apart from accessing top brand ads from GreedyGame inventory, we also run our own campaigns of big brands. This feature to run your own campaigns, which is also very useful when you want to promote your own game promotion ads as a back fill.

Sachin Uppal, CMO @ Games 24x7 (Advertiser)

We have been working with GreedyGame for 5 months now and are seeing a very good ROI. They deliver great non-intrusive experiences to audiences which is surprisingly driving real valuable customers to us. We hope to scale further and strengthen this partnership while maintaining good performance. Great work GreedyGame team!

Live Talk App, Azhar Technologies (Publisher)

Earlier we were afraid to use this new ad solution and thought it might be the same as other ad networks. But after integrating GreedyGame native ads, we realised that this kind of ads works well compared to any other native ad network and most important thing is that it didn’t affect user experience, and we are getting 30-35% additional revenue.
